comments.body:
I think you will need to add the compilers here and remove ``noarch`` as well
```suggestion
requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  skip: true  # [win and vc<14]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
